ISSUE.TITLE: Full text enabling error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: 'PK_LocalizedProperty' is not a valid index to enforce a full-text search key. A full-text search key must be a unique, non-nullable, single-column index which is not offline, is not defined on a non-deterministic or imprecise nonpersisted computed column, does not have a filter, and has maximum size of 900 bytes. Choose another index for the full-text key. when want to enable Full text search. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/67170/full-text-enabling-error-nopcommerce-420.aspx
